name: Blind Eyed Detective
description:
Be a blind dective tring to solve a case. explore crimes scenes and solve their mysteries.  But  watch what your doing beacuse you are blind. 

Remember: Keep a paper on hand to take notes!

This is my submition for Puerto Rico Online Game jam, Whos theme was "The unkown".

So i made the unlikely pair of blindness and detective work to give birth to ....

Blind Eyed Detective

 to very bizarre results.

This game features

  • A mystery about a murder
  • The need to take notes while playing
  • Completly dark rooms to simulate blindness

Its not a big project but a small and complling project made in 3 day as the game jam standard follows. I hope that someone some where finds it enjoing and likes it.

ANYWHO, Heres my humble work
